actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Social Security Act to establish an Office of Administrative Law Judges in the Social Security Administration.
short_title: Administrative Law Process Enhancement Act of 2002
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Administrative Law Process Enhancement Act of 2002 - Amends title VII (Administration) of the Social Security Act to establish an Office of Administrative Law Judges in the Social Security Administration.

titles.title: Administrative Law Process Enhancement Act of 2002
To amend the Social Security Act to establish an Office of Administrative Law Judges in the Social Security Administration.
